title: How to Create a Half Sphere in SketchUp

steps.title: Create a Circle in SketchUp.
steps.content: Create a Circle in SketchUp. Change your perspective and create another circle.

steps.title: Click on the Pencil tool and draw a line on the bottom of the first circle.
steps.content: Click on the Pencil tool and draw a line on the bottom of the first circle. This will be used to separate the two halves of it.

steps.title: Click the Eraser tool and then 'erase' the bottom half.
steps.content: Click the Eraser tool and then 'erase' the bottom half.

steps.title: Change your perspective so that you are looking down from the top, select the bottom circle, click on the Follow Me tool and then click on the 'upright' circle.
steps.content: Change your perspective so that you are looking down from the top, select the bottom circle, click on the Follow Me tool and then click on the 'upright' circle.

steps.title: Use the eraser tool to erase the circle that created the path.
steps.content: Use the eraser tool to erase the circle that created the path. The part that is not part of the dome.
